info.name: Oculomotor & Trochlear nuclei
info.description: The oculomotor and trochlear nuclei are located in the the midbrain at the ventral border of the periaqueductal gray matter.  The oculomotor nuclei are composed of several subnuclei and are located at the rostral-caudal level of the superior colliculus.  The trochlear nuclei are located at the rostral-caudal level of the inferior colliculus.
info.item: /Sections/Thin, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/2 Sag Thin Sec
